block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
A.S.V. Inc., Marcell, Minn., an initial public offering of 1.2 million shares. Summit Investment Corp.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
A.S.V. Inc., Marcell, Minn., an initial public offering of 1.2 million shares. Summit Investment Corp.
Acmat Corp., New Britain, Conn., 2.375 million class A shares. Advest Inc.
Adtran Inc., Huntsville, Ala., an initial public offering of two million shares. Dean Witter Reynolds.
Amerlink Corp., Columbus, Ohio, an initial public offering of one million shares. Legg Mason Wood Walker Inc.
Applied Imaging Corp., Santa Clara, Calif., an initial public offering of 1.5 million shares. Allen & Co.
Boston Chicken Inc., Naperville, Ill., two million shares. Merrill Lynch.
Cali Realty Corp., Cranford, N.J., an initial public offering of 9.1 million shares. Prudential Securities.
Canterbury Park Holdings Corp., Shakopee, Minn., an initial public offering of two million units, each representing one share and one-half warrant. R. J. Steichen& Co.
Carlyle Golf Inc., Denver, an initial public offering of 1.7 million shares. Neidiger, Tucker, Bruner Inc.
Carnegie Bancorp, Princeton, N.J., 500,000 shares and 500,000 warrants. Janney Montgomery Scott Inc.
Cherry Corp., Waukegan, Ill., 2.5 million class A shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Evans Wythcombe Residential Inc., Scottsdale, Ariz., an initial public offering of 9.18 million shares. Merrill Lynch.
Global Market Info Inc., New York, an initial public offering of 1.2 million shares and 1.2 million warrants. First Hanover Securities Inc.
HMG Worldwide Corp., New York, 3.045 million shares. Jefferies & Co.
Newvision Technology Inc., Burlington, Mass., an initial public offering of three million units, each representing one share and one warrant. D. Blech & Co.
PMT Services Inc., Nashville, an initial public offering of 3.1 million shares. Alex. Brown & Sons.
Photoball USA Inc., San Diego, an initial public offering of one million units, each representing one share and one warrant. Gaines Berland Inc.
Polish Telephones and Microwave Corp., Plano, Tex., an initial public offering of 500,000 units, each representing two shares and one warrant. Dickinson & Co.
Sirena Apparel Group Inc., South El Monte, Calif., an initial public offering of 1.5 million shares. Wedbush Morgan Securities Inc.
Steinbrecher Corp., Burlington, Mass., an initial public offering of three million shares. Alex. Brown & Sons.
Team Rental Group Inc., Daytona Beach, Fla., an initial public offering of 2.65 million shares. CS First Boston.
Trigen Energy Corp.,White Plains, an initial public offering of 3.2 million shares, 2.56 million in the United States and Canada. Lazard Freres.
Tower Automotive Inc., Minneapolis, an initial public offering of 4.25 million shares. Kidder, Peabody & Co.
U.S. Diagnostic Labs Inc., Valley Stream, L.I. an initial public offering of 1.2 million shares. Winthrop (Colin) & Co.
Wave Technology International Inc., St. Louis, an initial public offering of 1.2 million shares. Janney, Montgomery & Scott.
Weirton Steel Corp., Weirton, W. Va., 17 million shares, 14.45 million in the United States and Canada. Salomon Brothers.
Source: MCM CorporateWatch.
Ratings: Moody's/Standard & Poor's.
